description: Discover the best hotels in Washington, D.C., United States. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Grand Heritage Washington D.C. Retreat Moments from the White House with Historic Onsite Bar
hotels.description: Experience the grandeur of the USA's capital city with a stay at the iconic InterContinental The Willard Washington D.C., an IHG Hotel. Located just two blocks from the White House, this historic hotel has hosted numerous dignitaries and celebrities since 1818. Savour exquisite French cuisine at Café du Parc or sip classic cocktails at Round Robin Bar, dubbed the 'Oval Office of Bars' by Condé Nast Traveller. For a touch of tranquillity amid the city buzz, retreat to The Willard Spa.

hotels.title: Trendy Downtown Washington DC Escape with Rooftop Bar & Live Music Venue
hotels.description: Stay at the trendy Eaton DC, a boutique hotel located in vibrant downtown Washington DC. The hotel's culinary offerings are a delight: Michele's restaurant serves up French-American cuisine, while Wild Days rooftop bar and lounge is the place to be for tacos, s'mores and cocktails enjoyed against the atmosphere of live music. For relaxation, retreat to the expansive wellness centre with yoga and meditation on offer, as well as a variety of classes and workshops.

hotels.vendor_name: The Royal Sonesta Washington, DC Capitol Hill
hotels.title: Contemporary Washington DC Stay near Capitol Hill with Gallery Atrium & French Bistro
hotels.description: Be among the first to enjoy this art-inspired retreat in Capital Hill, just moments from Washington DC’s iconic landmarks. Step into a striking 10-storey atrium where a curated collection of commissioned artworks greets you. Indulge at the onsite Parisian bistro, offering a robust menu of champagne, inventive cocktails and classic French dishes like steak frites. Once you've explored the hotel, head out and explore the United States' capital. Visit the White House, take a walk from the Washington Monument to the Lincoln Memorial, and then explore one of the many Smithsonian museums.

hotels.title: Harbourfront Washington DC European-Inspired Escape with Rooftop Bar & Pool Terrace
hotels.description: Stroll along Washington DC's waterfront and the city's coolest neighbourhood from your base at the Pendry Washington DC - The Wharf, where European-inspired design and breathtaking harbour views are set to delight. When you're not exploring the wonders of The Wharf, take a moment to indulge in one of the three onsite dining venues, whether it's Japanese flavours at rooftop bar Moonraker or a handcrafted cocktail at Bar Pendry.

hotels.title: Washington DC Sophisticated Downtown Stay with Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Stay within arm’s reach of Washington DC’s iconic monuments at Kimpton Banneker Hotel, an IHG Hotel, located on a tree-lined avenue with views of The White House. Dine at the timeless French bistro, Le SeL, which tantalises with Parisian flavours, or sip cocktails at the enchanting Lady Bird rooftop bar. Take leisurely strolls through buzzing Dupont Circle and peruse bustling downtown during your Washington DC stay.

hotels.title: Art-Inspired Boutique Luxury in the Heart of Washington DC with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: If you're looking for contemporary indulgence in the US capital, you'll find it at Viceroy Washington DC. This sleek luxury lodging is just steps from the boutiques, bars, restaurants and galleries of 14th Street. Landmarks such as The White House, Dupont and Logan circles, U Street, and the Convention Centre are easily accessible by foot, but should you wish to explore further afield, there’s a Metro station just 10 minutes from the hotel. Spacious rooms and suites are designed to calm the senses and provide a little slice of peace and quiet among the hustle and bustle of the city. Start your day with a coffee on the open-air patio at BPM Coffee & Wine. Explore the hotel’s very own gallery, The Salon, which hosts works from local artists, or admire the city from above in the rooftop pool and penthouse deck (open seasonally), designed for days lounging in the sun.
